channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- lessindex node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- lessindex node module

item.title: CVE-2017-16211|2024-09-17T02:11:33.978Z -- hackerone -- lessindex%20node%20module
item.description: lessindex is a static file server. lessindex is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, giving an attacker access to the filesystem by placing "../" in the url.
